concept.title: WebSocket Server
concept.shortdesc: The WebSocket Server origin is a multithreaded origin that listens on a WebSocket endpoint and processes the contents of all authorized WebSocket requests. Use the WebSocket Server origin to read high volumes of WebSocket requests using multiple threads.

conbody.p: WebSocket Server originovervieworiginsWebSocket Servermultithreaded originsWebSocket ServerThe WebSocket Server origin can use multiple threads to enable parallel processing of data from multiple WebSocket clients.
Before you configure the origin, perform additional steps to configure the WebSocket clients.

When you configure the WebSocket Server origin, you specify the maximum number of concurrent requests to determine how many threads to use. You define the listening port, application ID, and the maximum message size.
